articles.description: Arsenal face Bournemouth and Man City host Wolves in the Premier League title race, plus Burnley & Nottingham Forest play as they look to avoid relegation.

articles.description: Burnley's 12th defeat at home this season means they are five points adrift of 17th-placed Nottingham Forest with two games remaining.
articles.title: Burnley 1-4 Newcastle: Vincent Kompany's side 'doomed' after loss

articles.description: Callum Hudson-Odoi scores twice as Nottingham Forest take a big step towards Premier League survival by beating already-relegated Sheffield United.
articles.title: Forest beat Sheff Utd to boost survival chances

articles.description: Just two and a half years into his managerial career, Kieran McKenna has guided Ipswich to two promotions and a return to the Premier League.
articles.title: Kieran McKenna guides Ipswich Town back to 'promised land'
